name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
schedule:
Week 1 Class overview
Week 2 Review Ch 8 and Ch 9
Week 3 Ch.10 One-Sample Test of Hypothesis (1)
Week 4 Ch.10 One-Sample Test of Hypothesis (2) 
Week 5 Ch.11 Two-Sample Test of Hypothesis (1)
Week 6 清明節補假
Week 7 Ch.11 Two-Sample Test of Hypothesis (2)
Week 8 Exam 1
Week 9 Ch.12 Analysis of Variance (1)
Week 10 Ch.12 Analysis of Variance (2) 
Week 11 Ch.13 Correlation and Linear Regression (1)
Week 12 Ch.13 Correlation and Linear Regression (2)
Week 13 Exam 2 
Week 14 Ch.14 Multiple Regression (1) 
Week 15 Ch.14 Multiple Regression (2) 
Week 16 Ch.18 Time Series Forecasting (1) 
Week 17 Ch.18 Time Series Forecasting (1)
Week 18 Exam 3
scorePolicy:
In-class quiz: 15% 　　
Homework: 10%　　
Exam 1: 25%　　
Exam 2: 25%
Exam 3: 25%　　
Extra Credit (LearnSamrt): 3%
